body.name: Famiworths Upgraded Hot and Iced Coffee Maker for K Cups and Ground Coffee, 4-5 Cups Coffee Maker and Single-serve Brewers, with 30Oz Removable Water Reservoir, 6 to 24Oz Cup Size, Classic Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 8 hrs 51 mins
features: Hot and Iced Coffee at the Touch of a Button - While some mornings you prefer an iced coffee, there are colder mornings when a hot cup of coffee sounds great. No matter what your mood is, this single serve coffee maker always delivers a great cup of coffee. Not strong enough? Simply press the "strong" button to make the cup stronger or even use the strong setting to save on ground coffee for making a regular coffee.

Fresh, Non-watery Iced Coffee - By pressing the "OVER ICE" button, this iced coffee maker brews a strong cup of hot coffee directly on ice so when the ice melts, it's just the right concentration. Pouring regular coffee over ice can leave it tasting watery, and chilling coffee in the fridge takes time and can cause it to oxidize, affecting its flavor.

2-in-1 for K Cups and Ground Coffee: For strong coffee lovers, the coffee machine comes with a large reusable ground filter basket that holds up to 1.1oz of ground coffee, which is three times more coffee than a pod. Meanwhile, this single coffee maker also has the ability to brew pods. When making iced coffee from a pod, be sure to only use a 6 oz.

Multi-Cup Size Available & Removable 30oz Water Reservoir - You can choose to brew 6, 8, 10, 12, or 24 oz of your favorite coffee, tea, or iced beverage, making this 4 cup coffee maker suitable for real coffee lovers or anyone hosting a tea party with friends. 24 oz coffee is always paired with "STRONG" mode and a maximum of ground coffee (1.1 oz) is added to ensure the correct coffee concentration and flavor. The large water tank allows you to make 5 cups before needing a water refill.

Instant Heat Up Technology - This single cup coffee maker brews a cup very quickly - from the moment you press the button, to having a piping hot 6 oz cup of coffee in your hands, it's just 90 seconds!

Fits Most Cup Sizes: You can use mugs between 5 to 6.5 inches tall in this hot and cold coffee maker by placing drip tray in its normal position or placing it upside down. However, to fit taller mug, you also can remove the drip tray, but please make sure that the coffee in the mug is not full, otherwise the coffee will be splashed easily when you take off the mug.
Hot Coffee 175°F or Higher: Water quickly heats to the right temperature, helping to extract flavor and strength from perfectly ground coffee, giving you a great-tasting cup straight or with milk.

Easy to Clean: The built-in descale reminder will notify you to clean the machine by displaying an alternate red light on the "REGULAR" and "STRONG" buttons. You can then press these 2 buttons at the same time for 2 seconds to start the self-clean process after adding 14 oz. descaling solution. The ground basket is also dishwasher safe.

Memory Function Automatically Brews the Last Cup Size: This smart k-pod coffee maker has a memory function to remember your preferred cup. For example, if you selected an 8 oz cup last time, the next time you turn on the machine, it will automatically and conveniently brew an 8 oz cup so you don't have to select the size each time.
Safe to use: Whenever there is no water or not enough water in the tank or when the top cover is not properly closed, the coffee pod maker will stop working to ensure safety every time you use it.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Drop in a pod or ground coffee, make sure your cup is positioned correctly, select your cup size, and press a button. Coffee is brewed in seconds and you're ready to start your day.

The coffee comes out hot and flavorful, and still hot enough to add milk.Coffee pot shown in the picture is NOT included. This is not just a single cup coffee maker, but it can also brew 4-5 cups of coffee at a time. Instead of buying another 5 cup coffee maker, get maximum functionality from 1 machine and save money and space.Coffee pot shown in the picture is NOT included.

The Steps for Making Iced Coffee Aditional Tips for making non watery iced coffee: Grind your beans a bit smaller than you would for a regular drip coffeeUse insulated mug for your iced coffeeUse darker roasted beans with bolder descriptors like; chocolaty, black tea, caramel, nuttyReplace ice cubes with coffee ice cubes Step 1 Put 6oz ice cubes in cup Step 2 Select 6oz cup size Step 3 Pod a pod into machine Step 4 Press "OVER ICED" button Cautions Please follow the proper radio of water, ice and grounds when you make the iced coffee to get a cup of non-watery tasty iced coffee.

Easy To Clean The descale reminder alerts you when it's time to descale your iced coffee machine by displaying an alternate red light on the "REGULAR" and "STRONG" buttons. Descaling is an important process that removes accumulated calcium deposits, ensuring the best tasting brew possible.

Filter Net is made of 304 stainless steel, making it safe and durable. The filter basket is conveniently dishwasher safe. All accessories that you can get: 1* pod holder, 1*ground basket, 1*removable water tank, 1* drip tray, 1* recipe bookNote: All coffee pots, mugs and cups shown in the pictures are not inclueded in the package.

How is this different then brewing a strong pot of coffee and pouring over ice in a regular tumbler? Using our machine to make iced coffee is more convinent and it brews directly into the tumbler so the coffee is fresher and flavorful. Pouring regular coffee over ice can leave you with watered-down flavor. Does the coffee come out cold? No, this coffee machine brewes hot, extra-strength coffee over ice so that when the ice melts, it's the right stregth. Does this machine also make iced tea? Yes, this ground coffee maker has a big filter basket, so you can brew tea leaves in it. Does this coffee maker have an auto-shutoff? Yes, after brewing coffee, it will automatically shut off, that is safe to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hot and Iced Coffee Maker
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This water reservoir, which is detachable and holds 30 ounces of water, is a sensible design decision that makes it simple to fill and clean. It doesn't matter whether I'm in the mood for a single-serve cup of coffee or if I want to prepare up to four or five cups of coffee for a pleasant weekend breakfast; this coffee maker can easily adjust to meet my requirements. Because of this, I am able to experiment with a wide range of coffee alternatives, ranging from the versatility of K-cups to the opulence of beans that have been freshly ground. The capacity of the machine to accept cup sizes ranging from 6 to 24 ounces guarantees that I am able to tailor the strength and amount of my coffee to my own tastes. The ease of the brewing procedure, in conjunction with the speed with which it produces a cup of coffee that is both flawless and satisfying, is a wonderful match for my hectic mornings. By providing customers with the choice to choose between hot and iced coffee, a layer of adaptability is added that allows them to accommodate a variety of weather and mood situations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars makes great coffee
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the famiworths single serve and retuned it because the grounds kept seeping into the brewed coffee. famiworths received such good reviews i decided to try the uppgraded version. I love it. I like that it has a removable water container. I also like that the grounds basket was big enough to make 4 cups. The coffee is brewed to a nice hot temp. The coffee basket is very hard to open the first time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars at least 10 times better than my Keurig was.... being generous w 4 stars
reviews.reviewText: I can finally make a decent 'size' cup of coffee... and the taste is WAY better than Keurig.If you want a nice 16oz cup of coffee than this will save you alot of money....The basket cleans easy, holds enough coffee for actually taste when making a large cup...the K coffee machine was so annoying... the final straw was it overheating after DeScaling....the only worry I have with this coffee maker is the plastic seems cheap.... the basket lid is already stressed..Wonder how long it will last that alone should make this review 2 or 3 stars...but at least I can taste my coffee and I use about 2/3rds of what the K used...and I can taste it now...LOL

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a single brewer
reviews.reviewText: This coffee maker is surprisingly good, especially for the cost. It's easy to use, holds enough water in the reservoir for a few cups, and makes a very hot cup of coffee. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm not sure how this is going to end up yet. Out of the box, tried to open the basket for coffee grounds. The latch that holds down the lid will not open with a reasonable effort. Watching a review video, this wasn't an issue for them, it was easily opened, but noted another written review that had the same problem I have. The hinge that holds the lid is extremely flimsy and broke off once the basket was opened. I don't know if it can be operated in this condition or not, and don't have time to contact customer service right now. Will update once I get some sort of resolution. This was a fulfillment by Amazon product, so I'll try them first before contacting the seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great looking coffee maker, however, it splashes all over. I haven't tried the 3 different ways to make coffee. It's perfect and takes little space. not sure if it’s malfunctioning or if it’s just gonna be a big giant mess to always have a cuppa coffee. That is the reason I got rid of my Keurig. I’ve tried different size cups and it’s still splashes. It’s a little annoying. but it’s not real hot. The one thing I don’t like about it is the reservoir the lid does not seal correctly/there are small gaps. Aside from a few minor pain in the booty things it really is cute. Some people said it’s hard to push down on the lid or the where you put the coffee. But I do not have that problem. Hopefully I can contact the seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, easy, well built
reviews.reviewText: So far the product arrived as ordered and packaged well. Maker is nice and sturdy. Washed the maker and filled with water. Made a cup. Very nice!!! Love the adjustable size cup and the "strong" setting. So far it seems better than the Keurig I used before. Faster and easier to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the variety
reviews.reviewText: This is a great coffee maker! Love that i can use my own coffee in the filter pod (and i can use as much or as little coffee as i like.. its a huge filter!).. I also enjoy the convenience of being able to use the k-cups as well.. Several different brewing sizes (6, 8, 10, 12 & 24 oz), with regular or strong brewing.. plus over ice brewing as well.. it also has a water reservoir on the back which is super convenient for a quick cup!even has a couple of beeps for when your coffee is done! LOVE THIS!!! I just ordered an extra filter pod so I can have one always ready to go with my own roasted coffee! Great! Great! Great!
